mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM (SELECT MAX(MESSAGE_CODE) KEEP (DENSE_RANK LAST ORDER BY MESSAGE_DATE) AS MESSAGE_CODE , MAX(MESSAGE_CONTENT) KEEP (DENSE_RANK LAST ORDER BY MESSAGE_DATE) AS MESSAGE_CONTENT , MAX(MESSAGE_DATE) KEEP (DENSE_RANK LAST ORDER BY MESSAGE_DATE) AS MESSAGE_DATE , MAX(USER_CODE) KEEP (DENSE_RANK LAST ORDER BY MESSAGE_DATE) AS USER_CODE , MAX(USER_CODE1) KEEP (DENSE_RANK LAST ORDER BY MESSAGE_DATE) AS USER_CODE1 , MAX(SEND_NICKNAME) KEEP (DENSE_RANK LAST ORDER BY MESSAGE_DATE) AS SEND_NICKNAME , MAX(RECEIVE_NICKNAME) KEEP (DENSE_RANK LAST ORDER BY MESSAGE_DATE) AS RECEIVE_NICKNAME FROM MESSAGE_TABLE WHERE USER_CODE1 = #{ msgDTO.userCode1 } OR USER_CODE = #{ msgDTO.userCode1 } GROUP BY USER_CODE) A) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{ pageInfo.start } AND #{ pageInfo.end } ORDER BY MESSAGE_DATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MESSAGE_TABLE WHERE (USER_CODE1 = #{ userCode1 } AND USER_CODE = #{ userCode }) OR (USER_CODE1 = #{ userCode } AND USER_CODE = #{ userCode1 })
